experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: I have worked with clients in Retail and consumer goods, manufacturing and healthcare across a range of business problems. Select examples include- Business transformation for a top 3 retail company aimed at improving sales & profitability- Sales channel strategy for a leading electrical goods company- Brand management for a leading engineering and manufacturing company- Growth strategy for a industrial equipment manufacturer- Supply chain transformation for a specialty Healthcare manufacturer

experience.title: Engagement Manager
experience.description: Delivered a range of strategy consulting projects in the Life Sciences and Infrastructure verticals.Pharmaceuticals/ Life Sciences- Branded generics entry modes for a global top ten MNC across Korea, Philippines, Indonesia, Taiwan and Vietnam- China Portfolio development and market assessment for a global top 3 pharma distribution giant- Korea branded generics entry strategy, business case, commercial model and partnership structure for a global top 3 MNC pharma client- Australia and Taiwan entry strategy for one of the world's largest branded generic MNC client- Portfolio specific sales & marketing strategy for a global top 5 client in IndiaInfrastructure- Valuation and strategic due diligence of an e-waste series B funding opportunity for a global VC fund- Corporate portfolio and growth strategy for a leading infrastructure company to enable invest/divest/harvest decisions- Incubation support, business planning and AOP for a corporate entrepreneurial venture in the EPC and construction space- Business plan and partnership structuring for a "Train the Trainer" construction skills development center.

experience.title: Supply Chain, Network Manager
experience.description: Led a business process re-engineering exercise aimed at improving innovation delivery of the supply chain. Responsibilities included designing new processes and organization structure and implementing across Skin, Oral and Hair categories. Experience includes leading supply chain execution of six large product re-launches and several market activation projects.

experience.title: Assistant Manager, Logistics
experience.description: Headed the manufacturing and materials planning for Bangalore cigarette factory, which had a team of about 23 people. Responsibilities included planning and inventory management of over 150 products and 1200 materials. Other key responsibilities were warehouse management, vendor relationship management and focused vendor development project delivery.
